title: How to pick the right location to start a business in Shenzhen - Quora

response.answer_text: There are 10 industries to introduce to you : Shenzhen top ten most profitable industry: The first: the financial sector Second: consulting industry Third: radio and television industry and cultural art Fourth: software Fifth: electric/electrical machinery and equipment manufacturing Sixth: wholesaling Seventh: household appliances and electronic products retail Eighth: computer services Ninth: legal services Tenth: professional intermediary services But I think the best industry is that cross-border e-commerce rigid flexible pcb
